description: Ohad Hatzofe said he is using his knowledge of bird behaviour to recover corpses after Hamas's attack.
maintext: Mr Hatzofe said he tracks where the birds stop with GPS tracking devices. While the trackers do not have video, they can tell him how the bird is moving, what elevation it is at and other data points that can suggest areas of interest. He then cross-references that information with satellite imagery.
title: Ecologist tracks birds of prey to find Israeli dead
